symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature, often a sign of infection.

symptoms.name: Rash
symptoms.description: Red or irritated skin, common in many childhood illnesses.

symptoms.name: Sore Throat
symptoms.description: Pain or irritation in the throat, often with swallowing.

symptoms.name: Ear Pain
symptoms.description: Pain in or around the ear, common in children.

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.description: Forceful expulsion of stomach contents through the mouth.

symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.description: Frequent, loose, or watery stools.

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.description: A reflex to clear the airways, common in respiratory infections.

symptoms.name: Runny Nose
symptoms.description: Excess mucus from the nose, often due to colds or allergies.

symptoms.name: Abdominal Pain
symptoms.description: Pain in the stomach area, common in children.

symptoms.name: Poor Feeding
symptoms.description: Difficulty eating or lack of appetite, especially in infants.

symptoms.name: Irritability
symptoms.description: Unusual fussiness or crying, common in sick children.

symptoms.name: Wheezing
symptoms.description: High-pitched whistling sound when breathing, often with asthma.

symptoms.name: Pelvic Pain
symptoms.description: Pain in the lower abdomen, common in women.

symptoms.name: Irregular Menstruation
symptoms.description: Unpredictable menstrual cycles or missed periods.

symptoms.name: Heavy Menstrual Bleeding
symptoms.description: Excessive bleeding during periods.

symptoms.name: Vaginal Discharge
symptoms.description: Unusual discharge, may indicate infection.

symptoms.name: Breast Lump
symptoms.description: A lump or mass in the breast, should be evaluated.

symptoms.name: Painful Urination
symptoms.description: Burning or pain when urinating, possible infection.

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.description: Feeling unusually tired or weak.

symptoms.name: Hot Flashes
symptoms.description: Sudden feelings of warmth, common in menopause.

symptoms.name: Lower Back Pain
symptoms.description: Pain in the lower back, common in pregnancy and menstruation.
